entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain with possible thunderstorms. Accumulations should remain below warning criteria, although thunderstorms may bring some isolated locations close to the criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain with possible thunderstorms. Amounts may approach warning criteria in a few locations. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade reduced to low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
